extendedInfo.description: A full featured, fully customizable digital clock and weather forecast widgetThe widget features the following:- 3 widget sizes, 4x1, 4x2 and 5x2 (for Galaxy Note)- Flip animation- 12 skins to choose from- 5 weather icon skins- Portrait or landscape mode- 12 or 24 hour clock with date- Display the current week number- Current location (city, country) taken automatically from cell/wifi or GPS, or specified by the user- Weather conditions for current location (condition and temperature, low and high temperatures and weather icon)- Detailed weather forecast display including the following:  - Local time  - Sunrise and sunset time for current location  - Humidity and wind conditions  - Current condition, temperature and low and high temperatures  - Current condition icon  - Last weather update time  - 4 day weather forecast- World weather: Choose to display weather information for any number of different locations worldwide. Just select your favorite locations and you will immediately have updated weather and time information.- Refresh location or weather by tapping on the widget- Launch up to four different applications by tapping different widget hotspots (everything is user defined)The widget can be fully customized with the following options:- Choose the widget and weather icon skins- Choose the text color for the am/pm indicator, date, location, current weather condition, current temperature and hi/lo temperatures- Display 12 or 24 hour time with optional AM/PM indicator (if 12 hour format)- Beep every hour (optional)- Select the date display format- Display a manually selected location's time instead of phone's time- Use current location to display weather info or specify any location you want- Get location updates from the network (cell/WiFi) or your GPS- Display temperature values in Celsius or Fahrenheit- Optionally display the next alarm- Select automatic weather refresh period (15 minutes, 30 minutes, 1, 2, 3, 4 or 6 hours)- Enter your favorite world locations to watch local times (including sunset and sunrize), current weather conditions and weather forecast information- Update weather on WiFi and/or GPRS- Choose whether you want to update while roaming or not- Play notification sounds on location and weather changes and updates- Select what application to launch when tapping the hours- Launch more applications by tapping the weekday or month- Optionally display the battery level- Specify how to receive location updates (how often and for how much distance)- Select alternate weather forecast serviceIMPORTANT!!!- This is a widget, not an application. To install it please refer to the help display when you run it. There is also a link to a video that shows you how to install it.- If you are using a task killer exclude the widget from itPlease report any problems, suggestions or requests via e-mail at xdroid27@gmail.com.

reviews.title: Great but....
reviews.comment: Battery life is considerably shorter while running. Otherwise great app. Looks great and fun to customize. Weather could be a little more accurate too.
reviews.author: Rupert White

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve always liked the HTC Sense look. This widget can give any android device the same slick appearance. The weather and clock are accurate, and the customizable app launchers make up for taking up two rows of your home screen. (There is a smaller one x one widget available). Many options to customize appearance, as well. Ads are minimal on the weather screen. Great free app, five stars!
reviews.author: Jesse Alvarez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Love it.  Love the accuracy and the design.  Works great.
reviews.author: jim carl

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: At last a clock widget that occupies the whole width of my Note\'s screen. Great work. My samsung now has some \"sense\".
reviews.author: Iain Wilks

reviews.title: Clockwidget
reviews.comment: Wow \' its a nice widget clock in other apps clock widget this app is very nice .. thanks for this making app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t update the time or weather properly, more trouble than it\'s worth
reviews.author: Renee Hood

reviews.comment: Would be perfect if it had a radar display option when you open weather. Other than that works great and accuweather is probably as close as they get. But I live in New England so... that\'s not saying much.\tHence the need for real time radar updates.
reviews.author: Heather Leighann

reviews.title: Great looks and functionality
reviews.comment: Well designed and compact design and doesn\'t hog resources or power. It is always nice to have time, date, battery % all at a glance.
reviews.author: Gabriel Shepard

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I like this app very much. I recommend it to anyone, it does everything as discribed.
reviews.author: Manuel Alvarenga

reviews.title: Excellent for my point of view.
reviews.comment: Looking Awesome in my mobile.. Galaxy Grand.
reviews.author: Haridev Das

reviews.title: Awesome stuff
reviews.comment: Best flip clock ever used in galaxy S4.works great! Tried others but this one is mind blowing and rocks. Love u Dev and thanks it\'s free.
reviews.author: Nafees Azhar

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is by far one of the most stable weather app that I have used.
reviews.author: Garfield Taylor

reviews.title: greatest  of all
reviews.comment: well done  most wanted after I switched from HTC to S4 ......
reviews.author: mian raza Ataullah

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Awesome app love the stock circle widget but sense clock is a great alternative
reviews.author: Vince SantaCruz

reviews.title: Easily the best weather/clock combo app
reviews.comment: Customizeable buttons all over the surface of the app are great.  I can jump into my clock functions (stopwatch,  alarm), my calendar,  I even have my location set as a shortcut to yelp!
reviews.author: Rob Nickell

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Really nice app,looks good and very informative. nexus 4 in Croatia.
reviews.author: Christopher Smith

reviews.title: would give 5 stars but
reviews.comment: I would rate 5 stars if the clock shown the correct time when you turn on the phone. But it does not update automatically.
reviews.author: Arliss Freire

reviews.title: Slightly better than avg
reviews.comment: OK but lacks the HTC animation and does not cover all cities and towns covered by cell and GPS relay.
reviews.author: Kristin Regina

reviews.title: Great app! LG Spectrum
reviews.comment: This app is great! Had a few bugs with location not actually being correct but seemed to fix that. Iove that it has a time n date widget.  That was important to me.
reviews.author: Shelly Roth

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I\'m glad I have it, it\'s great!
